short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert between pixels and rem units (bi-direction). Easily copy and paste.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple PX - REM converter
Convert pixel units to rem or reversely

--------
How to use it:
1) Click on the extension icon
2) A popup window will appear
3) (optional) Click on toggle if you want reverse conversion.
4) (optional) Enter you customized root font size.
5) Enter value you want to convert and hit "Convert" button.

--------
How to use bulk convert:
1) Click on the extension icon
2) A popup window will appear
3) Enter a list of values separated by comma.
4) Or adjust the root font size.
5) The result in table will be automatically updated.

You can also copy the converted value.
